item.description: Yes, I know Saturday is the 4th of July, but I thought there might be some folks who want to get a run out of the way before they stuff themselves with burgers, hot dogs and macaroni salad. According to my training schedule, I'm supposed to do a 10 mile run this weekend, but that's not going to happen. So, if any of you would like to join me for a leisurely (9.5 minute per mile pace) run, or, if this weather keeps up, backstroke along the Charles, let me know. I am open on the distance; we can do just 6 or we can do 8. We'll start at Panera Bread in Watertown at Arsenal on the Charles and figure it out from there. Please only rsvp if you are a "Yes" or a "Maybe."

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Saturday Morning 6 to 8 Mile Run Along the Charles
